Data: Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs a full toss, clipped through midwicket for two, didn't hit that too hard
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs lousy start from Marsh, another full toss at a friendly height on middle and leg, Rohit puts it away to the midwicket boundary with a controlled flick through the gap
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run good length just outside off, much better line and length, Rohit defends on the front foot
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run good length just outside off again, Rohit defends on the front foot with a straight bat
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs leans forward and across his stumps to flick a full ball from outside off stump towards wide mid-on
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run moves across his crease towards the off and gently drives a full ball towards wide mid-on again
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run a good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run 134 kph, a good length again, outside off stump, Rohit strides forward and defends on the off side
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run Paris dives to left at mid on and cuts off Rohit's firm drive off the front foot, saves four runs
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run pushed gently off the front foot, straight to Paris this time. Boland hits the pitch quite hard, while Paris was skiddier
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run Rohit pushes forward to defend but the ball straightens off the good length a bit and takes the outside edge along the ground behind point
Boland to Kohli, 1 run clipped off the pads through midwicket for a single
Marsh to Kohli, FOUR runs shot! A half-volley from Marsh outside off, Kohli meets it on the front foot and drives wide of the fielder at mid-off, outstanding timing
Marsh to Kohli, no run moves forward and across and plays the ball into the leg side in front of midwicket
Marsh to Kohli, no run short ball outside off, Kohli lets it go
Marsh to Kohli, no run short of a length outside off, Kohli moves towards the off side in his crease and lets it pass
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run short of a length angling into the body, Kohli tucks it off his hips in front of square
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run short of a length and rising outside off, Rohit rides the bounce, rising on to his toes and playing the ball towards point

Boland to Kohli, FOUR runs a half volley on the pads, full is not the way to go on this pitch, Kohli leans forward and across and flicks the ball between mid-on and midwicket. Head right over the ball, great wrists.
Boland to Kohli, 1 leg bye shorter length but on the pads, Kohli leans forward and across and glances to fine leg
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run pushed off the front foot to midwicket
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run good length and straight, defended back to the bowler
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run good length around off, played from the crease on the off side
Boland to Kohli, no run defended from the crease on the off side
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run in the blockhole right away, Rohit moves forward and plays it towards mid on
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run a full toss angling just past off stump, think Rohit was cramped for room on the drive and he tried to hit it a bit too hard, straight to mid off
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run good length on off stump, Rohit defends on the leg side
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run full again outside off, Rohit times the drive well but hits it along the ground to long off
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run shorter length angling across the right hander, played from the crease towards cover point

Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs shot! I dont understand this full length on this pitch, on leg and middle this time. Rohit moves forward and drills the straight drive between the bowler and mid-on, that simply scorched across the outfield

Boland to Kohli, no run there you go, the length is shorter and the ball rises sharply towards Kohli's left shoulder as he moves towards the off side, he checks his shot and Wade dives to his left to collect
Boland to Kohli, no run defended from the crease on the leg side
Boland to Kohli, 1 run short of a length outside off, Kohli stays back and opens the face to steer the ball to third man
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run played behind square leg for a single
Boland to Kohli, no run good length angling into middle stump, leans forward and defends to midwicket
Boland to Kohli, no run short of a length outside off, left alone by the batsman
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run good length on a middle and off line, Rohit presses forward and defends
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run defended on the off side on the front foot
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run steered off the back foot with the angle across him to third man
Faulkner to Kohli, no run defended off the back foot on the off side
Faulkner to Kohli, no run leans forward and clips a length ball off his pads to midwicket where Bailey dives to his right and prevents the ball from passing him
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run stays in his crease and opens the face to play the ball to third man
Boland to Kohli, 1 leg bye good length and angled in, Kohli does not quite connect with a flick and tickles it to the leg side for one
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run nice and full outside off, forward and pushed back to the bowler
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length, turned to square leg for one
Boland to Kohli, 1 run too straight in line, worked to the midwicket region
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run tight line around off, Rohit drops it defensively onto the pitch off the front foot
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full and on middle, Rohit walks across off and helps it to long leg
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run short, aiming for the top of off, chopped towards point
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs banged in short and outside off, Rohit drags a pull over square leg. Rohit shows intent and scampers across for the second run
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run dug in short and close to the off stump again, the batsman is up on his tippy toes, riding it down to third man
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run full and slanting away outside off, Kohli sits back, late-dabs it down to third man
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run pitched further up and outside off, front-foot drive into short cover, where Smith throws himself to his right to make a smart stop
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and on middle, punchily driven to mid-on
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run full and outside off, smoothly driven through cover
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish and outside off, Rohit hops and dabs it down to third man. He opens 2016 with a fluent fifty
Marsh to Kohli, no run back of a length and hint of extra bounce outside off. Kohli seeks to dab it down to third man now. No dice. This ball was closer to the off stump
Marsh to Kohli, no run full and bang on the off stump, Kohli strides forward and pushes it down the ground
Marsh to Kohli, no run more lift in the channel outside off, Kohli respects it and shoulders arms
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run good length and outside off, drop-and-run single into the covers. Kohli calls for it and beats the throw
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run pitched up and outside off, drilled to mid-off, where Warner makes a half-save
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs bouncer angled outside off, Rohit does not shy away from the pull. He sends it over the leaping keeper off a top edge
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run short and on off, Rohit gets across in defence
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length and around off, back-cut neatly to third man
Faulkner to Kohli, no run rising ball on middle, Kohli rises with it and diffuses it onto the pitch
Faulkner to Kohli, no run bouncer angled across Kohli with more sting. Kohli drops his wrists and lets it fizz through to Wade
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pitched up and around off, flicked through square leg. 100 up for India
Marsh to Kohli, no run short and aimed at top of off, punchily played to cover
Marsh to Kohli, 2 runs another bumpy short ball just a shade outside off, Kohli swivels on the back foot, rolls his wrists and pulls it towards deep midwicket
Marsh to Kohli, no run dug in shorter again, this one is chopped behind to Wade
Marsh to Kohli, no run length and outside off, keeps a touch low. Kohli stoops and blocks it towards square point
Marsh to Kohli, 2 runs full and outside off, bunted to mid-on for a quick single. Warner is eager to throw the stumps down, but ends up conceding an overthrow
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run tossed up and full, patted to the leg side on the front foot
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run pushed through, Rohit dances out and quitely blocks it in front of cover

Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run slides on off at 90ks, dabbed towards midwicket. There is a mix-up. Kohli sets off for a single, Rohit sends him back rather late. Kohli manages to reach the safety of his crease
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run darted outside off, punched past the covers
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run hurled flat, punched down the ground
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run non-turning ball outside off, pushed past cover
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run pitched up and outside off, tapped to short cover
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and on off, dabbed towards point
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs pitched up and on off, Rohit picks it up and launches it over cow corner for a six!
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run Rohit stays back, rides the bounce of this short ball and secures a single to third man
Marsh to Kohli, no run full and outside off, Kohli comes forward and eases it to cover
Marsh to Kohli, no run lifting short ball on a fourth-stump line, Kohli hops and fends it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run skiddy ball on off, defended to the leg side
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run full and on off, knocked to midwicket, where the fielder dives to his left to stop the ball
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs slides on, chopped off the off stump fine of the keeper on the off side
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run drifting down leg, helped to long leg with a sweep
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 wide fired down leg as Maxi beats Kohli's sweep. Wide
Maxwell to Kohli, no run Kohli twirls his wrists and flicks but can't beat square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, 2 runs heading down leg again, paddled very fine on the leg side
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length and outside off, punched past point
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run dug in outside off, glided to third man
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and extra bounce outside off, beats Rohit's cute little dab
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short on off, Rohit hops and nurdles it square on the leg side
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run back of a length and on off, chopped to point, where Maxi runs in, swoops down on the ball, and prevents the single
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run length and outside off, played towards point. Maxi is lurking there... and India wont take him on
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs Rohit brings this right out of the top draw! Flighted and outside off, Rohit likes the flight. He steps out and lofts it down the ground
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run fired outside off, flayed to short cover. The fielder feels the heat
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run drifting down leg, helped fine
Maxwell to Kohli, no run defended back to the bowler
Maxwell to Kohli, FOUR runs tossed up on the leg stump, Kohli goes low now and sweeps it with good control over backward square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, 2 runs fired flat and quick, Kohli gets an inside edge onto the sweep for a couple
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run Hazlewood tests the batsman with a bouncer outside off, it boings off the surface. Rohit rocks his head out of the way
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and on off, played back to the bowler
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run banged in outside off, miscued pull to midwicket
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run keeps it short and outside off, Rohit leans back but can't ramp it down to third man
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short and outside off, chopped down to third man
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run back of a length and on off, dropped defensively onto the pitch
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run dug in and angling away, dabbed to third man
Faulkner to Kohli, 2 runs full and aimed at off, bunted to short midwicket. A fumble there gives India the second run
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run short and outside off, controlled pull to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run lifter angled away outside off, Rohit sways his upper body out of the way
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs dug in short, but not have enough pace to pose a threat. 127.7ks. Pulled away behind square. Rohit runs across for the second
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run full and on middle, Rohit comes halfway forward and blocks it back to the bowler
Boland to Kohli, 1 run a touch too full and outside off, Kohli laces it to short cover. The ball bursts through the hands of the fielder
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run picked away off the pads to long leg
Boland to Kohli, 2 runs short ball on middle, Kohli shuffles inside the line and tucks it through backward square leg for two
Boland to Kohli, 1 run too straight in line again, glanced to long leg
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run good length and on off, stops on the batsman. Popped in front of mid-on
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length and outside off, slashed past cover
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and on off, blocked to midwicket
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs short and angling away, Rohit ramps it over the keeper. Nicely played
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run short and on middle, poked to leg in front of square
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and strikes the pad as Rohit does not connect with a flick
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run overpitched and outside off, Rohit belts it to mid-off
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish, chopped from off stump to third man
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pitched up and on off, flicked to deep square
Boland to Kohli, SIX runs dug in short and down the leg side, Kohli swivels and pulls it over long leg. He gets to his first fifty in ODIs v Australia in Australia
Boland to Kohli, no run shortish and outside off, chopped towards point
Boland to Kohli, no run back of a length and on off, blocked with a dead-straight bat on the front foot
Boland to Kohli, 1 run pitched up and on off, flicked through square leg. Neatly done
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full and on middle, Rohit sits back and nudges a single towards the square leg region
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run full and on off, Rohit pushes it solidly to mid-off on the front foot
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length, tucks Rohit up for room. Blocked onto the pitch
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run short and rises to catch Rohit in a tangle. He is pinged on the body
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run dug in shortish, Rohit now connects with a pull. Rolls his wrists and plays to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Kohli, no run back of a length on off, tucked to midwicket
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run short and angled away, guided to third man
Marsh to Kohli, no run length ball on off, Kohli targets covers with a drive but checks his shot and skews it to leg off the inside half
Marsh to Kohli, FOUR runs short and width outside off, Kohli frees his arms and cuts it uppishly over point
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run back of a length and on off, Rohit goes back and works one past midwicket
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run might have been a slower ball outside off, steered to backward point, where Maxi dives to his left and stops the ball
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Rohit throws his bat at it and drags it past the stumps, behind square on the leg side
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run shortish and outside off, Kohli runs it down to third man
Paris to Kohli, 1 run full and on the pads from over the wicket, clipped past midwicket
Paris to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pitched up and angling away outside off, steered to third man
Paris to Kohli, 1 run slanted onto the pads again, picked away past midwicket again
Paris to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs full and on off, Rohit drills it down the ground. Simply belted that, forcing the bowler and umpire to take evasive action
Paris to Rohit Sharma, no run Paris shortens his length and keeps Rohit to a defence
Paris to Rohit Sharma, 1 run glanced off the hips to long leg
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run slower ball on a good length outside off, defended on the front foot
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run short of a length outside off, Rohit jumps back and cuts, Maxwell dives to his left at point to save runs
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full delivery outside off, Rohit leans forward and drives through cover to move on to 99
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run a full ball outside off, Kohli leans forward and drives the ball through cover
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run good length and straight, Rohit gets behind the line and defends to the bowler
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run slower ball outside off, the cheers build up to a crescendo and then subside as Rohit defends towards point, the players will break for drinks
Paris to Kohli, FOUR runs a length ball on the pads, a no-no when fine leg is in the circle, Kohli glances Paris between the keeper and short fine leg for four more
Paris to Kohli, 1 run a fuller length on middle and off, Kohli pushes forward and punches to long off, and the crowd begins to chant Rohit's name again ...

Paris to Rohit Sharma, 1 run happy New Year, Rohit Sharma! He gets there with a steer to third man, and looks up to the skies as he runs the single. Takes off his helmet and raises his bat to the cheering crowd at the WACA
Paris to Kohli, 1 run steered to this man off the back foot
Paris to Rohit Sharma, no run pushes away from his body at a good length ball that slants across the right-hander from over the wicket, he's beaten
Paris to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs shoddy fielding from the man at point, was it Finch? Rohit got on the front foot to square drive and the fielder sort of dived over the ball
Boland to Kohli, 1 run leans forward and clips the length ball in front of square leg
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run good length outside off, moves forward and punches the ball into the covers
Boland to Kohli, no run leans on to the front foot and drives to mid on
Boland to Kohli, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, Kohli stays back and tucks the ball off his pads through square leg
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run a full ball on the pads, Rohit chips the ball over midwicket for a single
Boland to Kohli, 1 run short of a length outside off, Kohli stays back and guides the ball to third man
Paris to Kohli, no run good length, bounces a bit more and hits Kohli on the thigh as he decides to defend from the crease
Paris to Kohli, 1 run dabbed off the back foot towards third man
Paris to Rohit Sharma, no run defended from the crease towards the bowler

Paris to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs that is a tremendous blow! The ball is full and straight, no lateral movement at all, Rohit strides forward and frees his arms with a mighty swing, sending the ball into the crowd beyond long on , India are past 200
Paris to Rohit Sharma, no run pushed from the crease on the leg side
Paris to Rohit Sharma, 1 run Rohit chops the short of length ball on to his boot as he was trying to steer to third man, the ball goes on the off side and he hobbles the single
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run moves forward and across to work the ball off his pads to midwicket
Boland to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs he tees off again! Rohit plants his foot forward and lofts a full ball to the wide mid-on boundary, he's simply hitting through the line
Boland to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs full and on the pads this time, horrible line, Rohit moves across and glances fine enough to beat fine leg, hyperspace time?
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run played into the leg side off the front foot
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run Boland is known to have a good yorker and there's one of them, the heavy ball thudding into the blockhole on middle stump, Rohit defends
Boland to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs misses the yorker this time, and Rohit flicks the full toss off his pads with superb wristwork, he's hit it wide enough to beat long leg
Marsh to Kohli, no run the bouncer, Kohli tries to hook but is beaten
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run short of a length just outside off, Kohli stays back and opens the face to steer to third man
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short of a length angling into the right-hander, nudged from the crease towards midwicket
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run steered to third man again
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run a fuller ball, a slower ball, pushed off the front foot on the leg side for a single
Marsh to Kohli, no run short ball, Kohli tries to pull again but is beaten

Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs so deft from Rohit, pushes forward and then transfers weight back as the short of a length ball comes at him, opens the face late to play the ball fine of third man for four more
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run cut off the back foot but can't beat the man at point
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run hangs back and steers the ball to third man once again
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run moves back and across to work a short of a length ball off his hips but misses and gets hit on the thigh, the ball drops at his feet
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run short and wide outside off, Kohli carves it over cover, didn't time that well though
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run backs away and tries to heave a good length ball over the leg side, the bottom hand comes off the bat and the ball bounces towards midwicket
Marsh to Kohli, FOUR runs backs away towards leg stump, the ball is short and just outside off, Kohli slaps it through covers and pierces the gap in the deep
Marsh to Kohli, no run ducks under the bouncer but then decides to try and ramp it while down on his knees over the keeper, he misses
Marsh to Kohli, 1 wide another bouncer, this time Kohli does not need to duck because it lobs high over his head
Marsh to Kohli, FOUR runs shot! Jumps out of his crease to get to the pitch of a length ball and lofts it flat over the infield at cover, that's inside out ad in the gap
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run nudged towards midwicket for a single to bring up the 200 partnership off 218 balls
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run tries to work the ball square but it falls near his feet off the bottom edge, they run a quick single
Marsh to Kohli, no run good length and straight, defended from the crease back down the pitch
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run good length and straight in the channel outside off, driven on the up but doesn't find the gap at mid off
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short ball, Rohit goes back to pull but mis-times it to midwicket
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run worked off the pads behind square
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run backs away towards leg and taps the ball behind point for a single
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run look at the bounce on that ball! It leaps from short short of a length outside off and the batsman just manages to pull his bat inside the line of the ball
Hazlewood to Kohli, 2 runs tucked off the pads through square leg for a single
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run backs away towards leg, the bowler follows him from around the wicket, denying the batsman room, Rohit plays towards point

Faulkner to Dhoni, SIX runs that's in the crowd over long off! I don't think Dhoni middled this but such is the power and the velocity of his swing that it's good enough, he charged out of his crease and swung hard at a length ball
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run played into the off side
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run short of a length at he body, Dhoni swivels and pulls behind square
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide short ball down leg side, that's a wide

Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs shot! Moves across his stumps towards the off side, gets down low and paddle-scoops the full ball to the fine leg boundary, there was a fielder in the deep but it was too fine for him to reach
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs tucked off the pads gently through square leg, superbly run
Boland to Dhoni, 1 run Boland bowls one of those yorkers he is known for, Dhoni plays it out towards long on

Boland to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs misses the yorker this time, it's a low full toss, Rohit waits in his crease, bends a little to get under the ball and heaves it over deep midwicket, that's in the crowd
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run reaches forward and away from his body to drive a full ball through covers, 150 for Rohit, a superb innings, chanceless
Boland to Dhoni, 1 run hits the yorker this time, Dhoni digs it out through midwicket
Boland to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs he bowls yorkers to Dhoni and misses them against Rohit, another low full toss, Rohit gets under it again and lofts it cleanly over wide long on
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run this time he nails the yorker, Rohit stoops and digs it out on the off side for a single
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run a fuller length outside off, Rohit reaches for it and is beaten, Faulkner bowled that from around the wicket
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run Rohit charges and aims a loft down the ground, he's not timed this well at all and the ball falls safely just beyond the circle at mid-off

Faulkner to Kohli, OUT Kohli's hit that hard off the front foot, he's hit that flat, and the ball is headed over the long-on boundary but Finch runs to his left and takes the catch at head height. Kohli falls close to his hundred after an outstanding partnership. He's set India up for a huge total, but can the remaining batsmen hit from the get-go? Kohli timed that really well, just did
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run short of a length outside off from around the wicket, Dhoni stays in his crease and chops it into the off side
Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs short ball outside leg stump from over the wicket, Dhoni swivels on the back foot and pulls his second ball to the fine leg boudnary
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run fuller length on the pads, Dhoni flicks behind square

Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run an appeal for a caught behind but the umpire says not out! Dhoni tried to pull a short of a length ball angling down leg side and missed, that brushed the thigh pad on its way through to Wade
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 1 run dabbed through square leg for a single
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short of a length with extra bounce outside off, Rohit jumps back and ramps it towards the fielder at third man
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 2 runs played to point where Finch fumbles, Dhoni is quick to pounce on the mistake and race back for the second
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 1 run driven through the covers from the crease
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut down to third man for a single
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run a length ball angling into him from around the wicket, pulled to wide long on

Faulkner to Dhoni, OUT this is a superb catch from the debutant! Dhoni rocked back to the short ball and pulled hard, hitting the ball out of the middle. The ball was flying quickly to Boland's right and was nearly past him when he stuck out his right hand and grabbed it
Faulkner to Jadeja, FOUR runs Jadeja's nailed his first ball, the length was full and he slammed it off the front foot to the wide long on boundary
Faulkner to Jadeja, 3 runs full and wide outside off, Jadeja reaches for it and chops the ball behind point, they are sprinting between the wickets, insane speed and they come back for the third
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run backs away towards leg and pushes the ball into the covers for a quick single
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run full and wide outside off, Jadeja drives through covers and keeps the strike
Boland to Jadeja, 1 run nearly in the blockhole, Jadeja drives to long off for a single

Boland to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs Over the keeper! Rohit got down low to sweep a low full toss from outside off stump, that ball flew off the back of the bat and bounced inches before the boundary before going over, that was nearly a six!

Boland to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs misses the yorker again to Rohit, who is ready and waiting, he got under the ball and lofted it high and far over the wide long on boundary. Rohit was deep in his crease as he hit that. He swung with such power that he's broken his bat and needs a new one
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run in the blockhole this time, Rohit stays back and drives to long off for a single
Boland to Jadeja, 1 run in the blockhole again, driven past the bowler for a single
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run in the blockhole outside off to finish the innings, Rohit tries to play on the off side but gets an inside edge on to the leg, India have made 61 off the last five overs

Is this total enough? It's a strong score for sure, but this pitch is great for batting and Australia bat deep. I reckon we have a game on our hands. My opinion is that India were on course for about 320-330 and didn't get there. Over to Deiva Muthu for the start of the chase.

2.50pm Australia have taken only three wickets in the innings. They have never taken fewer than that in a completed ODI innings before. India lost Dhawan early but Rohit and Kohli put on 207 runs for the second wicket to set India up. And then Rohit stayed the course to provide the innings an aggressive finish. He ended unbeaten on 171, the highest score by a visiting batsman against Australia
I don't think Bailey was using this stance in the BBL
Barinder Sran to Smith, no run full and angled away outside off, mis-hit drive back to the bowler
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 run length and on a fourth-stump line, dabbed to cover for a well-judged, quick one
Barinder Sran to Bailey, no run slanted across off on a fuller length. No shot offered
Barinder Sran to Bailey, no run back of a length and outside off, Bailey answers with a solid punch to cover
Barinder Sran to Bailey, 2 runs short and rises outside off, flat-batted away past midwicket
Barinder Sran to Bailey, 1 run full and outside off, pushed to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, FOUR runs too full and outside off, Bailey leans into a drive and picks the gap between the covers and mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, no run length and outside off, tapped to mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, no run Bailey who is standing outside leg, gets across and plays this full ball back to the bowler
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, no run back of a length and outside off, punched to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, no run back of a length, guided to backward point
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, no run shortish and outside off, punched to the man at mid-off
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 run back of a length and on middle, Smith walks across off and flicks behind square
Barinder Sran to Bailey, FOUR runs dug in short and outside off, Bailey rocks back and nails a pull. The man at midwicket (Ashwin) got his hand to it. Yet the ball reached the fence
Barinder Sran to Bailey, FOUR runs and again! Bailey takes this short ball from outside off. This sat up and Bailey pulled this strongly behind square
Barinder Sran to Bailey, no run back of a length and outside off, played to cover
Barinder Sran to Bailey, 1 run Sran errs short and gives room again. Pulled to deep midwicket now
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 run another short one outside off, pulled to long-on
Rohit Sharma to Smith, 1 run tossed up, driven down the ground
Rohit Sharma to Bailey, no run full on middle, knocked to midwicket
Rohit Sharma to Bailey, 1 run Bailey uses his feet and drives it to long-on
Rohit Sharma to Smith, 1 run dropped short on middle, Smith skips back and pulls to deep midwicket
Rohit Sharma to Bailey, SIX runs flighted on middle from round the stumps, Bailey ventures out of the crease, meets the pitch and lifts it straight down the ground. Nice and clean!
Rohit Sharma to Bailey, 2 runs nudged off the pads through square leg. Bailey sprints across for the second
Yadav to Smith, 1 run back of a length on off at 138ks, turned to the midwicket region
Yadav to Bailey, no run short on off, Umesh hits 140ks. Bailey gets up on his toes and blocks
Yadav to Bailey, no run back of a length and on off, this is one click greater, punched to the off side

Yadav to Bailey, 1 run Umesh pings Bailey's glove! 142ks, leaps from a length and hustles onto Bailey. He looks to fend it away, but is socked on the glove, the ball rolls away towards point. Bailey calls for the single. He is hurt, but dives full length to make his ground. The fielder did not effect a direct hit, though
Yadav to Smith, no run back of a length, defended in front of his toes
Yadav to Smith, 1 run banged in outside off at 142.6ks, dragged past midwicket with a pull
Jadeja to Smith, 3 runs Smith uses his feet and welcomes Jadeja with a chip over midwicket
Jadeja to Bailey, no run fired outside off, pushed to cover
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run swatted from the off stump to long-on
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run hit past cover for one
Jadeja to Bailey, no run darted short, punched back to the bowler
Jadeja to Bailey, no run slides on at 91ks, blocked
Yadav to Smith, no run rising short ball outside off at 141ks, punched towards backward point
Yadav to Smith, no run back of a length and on off, Smith hangs back and dabs towards point
Yadav to Smith, 1 run Smith walks across the off stump and flicks it to long leg
Yadav to Bailey, 1 wide 137ks bouncer, zings over a ducking Bailey to the keeper. Wide called
Yadav to Bailey, no run short and aimed at the top of off, Bailey leaps and punches it crisply to mid-off
Yadav to Bailey, no run full and straight at 141ks, Bailey was late onto the flick after shuffling across. He takes it on the thigh
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run back of a length and on off, Bailey smartly drops it in front of point and calls Smith though for a quick, quick single
Jadeja to Bailey, no run tossed up and drifts in, Kohli dives to his right at mid-off and stops the drive
Jadeja to Bailey, no run darted short, punched back at Jadeja
Jadeja to Bailey, 2 runs picked away off the hips to backward square leg. Bailey comes back for the second
Jadeja to Bailey, no run drifts in flat, inside edged onto the leg side
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run another non-turning ball, which is driven down the ground
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run dug in short on off, Smith stands tall and forces it down to long-on
Yadav to Smith, 1 run Smith shuffles across off even before Umesh delivers. Pulls this short ball from outside off down to long leg
Yadav to Bailey, no run full and on the stumps, driven to mid-on
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run full and on off, skewed drive to mid-on off the inside half. A direct hit from Kohli there could have got rid of Bailey
Yadav to Smith, 1 wide full and heading down leg, beating Smith's flick. Another wide
Yadav to Smith, no run back of a length and on off, Smith gets behind the line and blocks to cover
Yadav to Smith, 1 run short ball on off, stylishly pulled to long leg after shuffling across
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run back of a length and outside off, guided to third man
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run goes back to a flat and straight ball and works it off his pads through midwicket
Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs short and wide outside off, no turn, Smith waits on the back foot and cuts late and cuts hard, beats point to his left for four
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run a full ball seemed to swerve away from Bailey, who swatted it off the front foot to long on
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run goes back and tucks the ball on the leg side
Ashwin to Smith, no run played into the leg side
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run pushed off the front foot to long on for a single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run punched off the back foot through cover point
Jadeja to Bailey, no run steps out of his crease and pushes the ball on the leg side
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run driven to long off for a single
Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs goes back into his crease and whips the ball off his pads, just a deft stroke but the timing is good and the placement better behind square
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run driven off the front foot to long on
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run worked off the pads through midwicket for a single
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run a full ball on the pads, driven off the front foot through midwicket
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run flicked off the pads through midwicket again to bring up the 100
Ashwin to Bailey, 2 runs driven off the front foot towards long off, an easy two ... runs coming easily now
Ashwin to Bailey, no run driven back to the bowler on the front foot
Ashwin to Bailey, FOUR runs the reverse sweep, and he's hit it through cover! He was well forward as he hit that
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run picks off another single through midwicket. Nine off this over, after eight each off the previous two
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run nudged on the front foot towards midwicket, Jadeja races across but can't prevent the single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run steps out and picks the ball off his pads in front of square leg for a single
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 wide fired down leg side, that's a wide
Jadeja to Bailey, no run stays in his crease this time and pushes a flat ball from middle to cover
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run steps out now and drives the ball past the diving midwicket fielder towards long on
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run pushed off the back foot gently towards cover point for a single
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run steps out to get to the pitch of the ball and drives to deep cover, six off this over
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run steps out of his crease and drives the ball off his pads through midwicket for a single
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run moves forward and across and punches to long on for a single
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run pulls the ball behind square, I missed Bailey bringing up his half-century
Ashwin to Smith, no run worked off the pads towards midwicket where the fielder dives to save runs
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run steps out of his crease to drive a full ball from outside off through cover
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run strays down leg side, Bailey swivels and swats to deep backward square leg, just five off this over
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run pushed off the front foot into the gap at cover for another easy single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run bowled slowly through the air on off, played with soft hands towards cover for one
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run nudged with soft hands very close on the leg side for one more, the 100 stand is up
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run worked off the pads through square leg for one more
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run dabbed off the front foot behind point, Bailey hesitates but Smith calls him through
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run played off the back foot behind point, six singles off that over
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven off the front foot to long on
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run leans forward and hits the ball along the ground to long on again
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run moves forward and drives the ball to long on for the third time in the over, the ball is doing nothing for Ashwin
Ashwin to Bailey, no run the carrom ball? Played towards midwicket for no run that time
Ashwin to Bailey, FOUR runs Bailey compensates for the dot ball by unfurling he reverse sweep, hitting it off the front foot from middle stump behind point for four
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run steps out of his crease and drives the ball to long on, another eight-run over without sweat
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run nudged off the pads behind square for ... another single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 leg bye dabbed off the pads behind square and they run one more, it's a leg bye so Smith stays on 49
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run pushed off the front foot to long off for a single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run pushed with soft hands through cover and Smith raises his bat for a half-century
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run worked off the pads behind square, short fine leg is on the edge of the circle, so another single
Jadeja to Smith, 2 runs cut off the back foot through point, they run a two to break the uniformity, seven runs off that over
Ashwin to Bailey, SIX runs no single this time, Bailey charges Ashwin, gets to the pitch of the ball, and smashes it over the long off boundary with a full and clean swing of the bat
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 leg bye worked off the pads towards short fine leg
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run Smith steps out and flicks the ball off his pads through square leg
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run short and wide outside off, cut off the back foot to deep point
Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs huge over for Australia, short and wide outside off, Smith goes back and cuts hard, in front of point this time for four, Ashwin looks so helpless here
Ashwin to Smith, SIX runs and it gets better for Australia! Smith charges, gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts dead straight, that's behind the sightscreen
Yadav to Bailey, no run good length and straight, driven back to the bowler
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot but bottom edged towards point
Yadav to Smith, 1 run short of a length outside off, Smith moves back and steers the ball behind point
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run short of a length and straight, short-arm pulled behind square after swivelling in his crease
Yadav to Smith, no run good length angling into off stump, slower ball too at 121 kph, defended into the off side
Yadav to Smith, 2 runs waits on the back foot and plays a punchy square drive behind point for two more
Kohli to Bailey, 2 runs a full ball on off stump, driven along the ground to long off for a single
Kohli to Bailey, no run reaches for the full and wide ball outside off and drives to cover
Kohli to Bailey, no run driven hard off the front foot, but can't beat cover this time
Kohli to Bailey, 1 run pushed back to the bowler, in the air for it bit but it bounces short of him, the ball deflects off his hand over the stumps at the bowler's end
Kohli to Smith, 1 run driven off the back foot through deep cover
Kohli to Bailey, 1 run reaches forward and away from his body and drives a full ball to deep cover
Yadav to Bailey, no run good length outside off, defended back to the bowler
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run short and wide outside off, cut hard off the back foot, Ashwin fumbles at point
Yadav to Smith, no run good length just outside off, Smith goes back and defends towards cover
Yadav to Smith, 1 run a half-volley on the pads, Smith whips from his crease, sending the ball skidding across the grass to deep square leg
Yadav to Bailey, 1 wide that bouncer is too high to escape the umpire's notice
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run turned off the pads to long leg for a single
Yadav to Smith, no run punched off the back foot through point
Kohli to Bailey, 1 run a full and friendly ball on off stump, driven off the front foot back to the bowler, Kohli can't stop it cleanly and deflects it towards extra cover
Kohli to Smith, 1 run driven to long on for a single
Kohli to Bailey, no run that's only 96 kph, Bailey was on the front foot too early and then defended it to the bowler
Kohli to Bailey, FOUR runs that's so short and such a gentle pace, it sits up for Bailey who can't have got many easier balls that that in his career, he pulls with power to the midwicket boundary
Kohli to Bailey, 1 run driven to long off for a single
Kohli to Smith, 1 run driven off the front foot to extra cover for a single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run steps out to a gentle delivery and drives to long on
Jadeja to Bailey, 3 runs short and wide outside off, goes on the back foot and cuts behind point
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run pushed off the back foot through point
Jadeja to Bailey, no run goes back and defends the ball on the leg side
Jadeja to Bailey, no run pushed off the front foot into the covers
Jadeja to Bailey, no run nudged off the front foot close on the leg side. Dhoni scampers towards square leg to save the single
Ashwin to Smith, no run drifts on to the pads, worked in front of square leg for a single
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run goes back into his crease and turns the ball through square leg, another drop into Australia's ocean

Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run it's all happening now! The paddle sweep results in a top edge, but it falls short of short fine leg. The fielder rips the throw to Dhoni who lets the ball go through between his legs and hit the stumps. He was standing in front of the stumps. Smith was easily safe though
Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs normal service resumes, short and wide outside off, Smith goes back and cuts through cover and finds the gap on the boundary
Ashwin to Smith, no run played back to the bowler
Ashwin to Smith, no run goes back to punch the ball on the off side and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Jadeja to Bailey, no run played back to the bowler
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run nudged off the pads behind square for a single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run pushed off the front foot through point for another single
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run dabbed with soft hands wide of short third man for a single
Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs short ball, on leg stump too, Smith stays back and pulls the ball behind square, poor line, poor length
Jadeja to Smith, 2 runs steps out of his crease to whip the ball off his toes through square, Australia cruise to 200
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, no run an appeal for lbw as the batsman tries to work the ball through the leg side but misses and gets hit on the pad, that may have been missing leg
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, 1 run short ball, swivels and pulls behind square for a single
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run short of a length and wide outside off, Bailey slashes and misses
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run good length just outside off, stays back in his crease and punches the ball towards point
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run just two runs of that over, turned off the pads for a single to long leg to finish it
Yadav to Smith, 1 run tries to turn the ball on the leg side but gets an edge that drops on the off side, they still run a single, the fielders in the circle are deep
Yadav to Bailey, 2 runs a full ball outside off, driven hard off the front foot, mid-off does well to dive to his left and stop the ball, it rolls away from him a little and they steal a second
Yadav to Bailey, 2 runs length and on the pads, glanced to fine leg and the running is so intense between the wickets
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run short ball, Bailey jumps back and across and pulls in front of square
Yadav to Smith, 1 run stays back to a length ball outside off and dabs it late behind the diving fielder at point
Yadav to Bailey, no run driven off the front foot towards midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run a fullish ball on the pads, Smith moves across his stumps and flicks the ball through square leg

Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, 2 runs that's his 100! Well played George Bailey, he had a reprieve first ball and he's made it count. He gets there by dropping the ball close on the off side for a single to move to 99, the bowler gets to the ball and throws at the striker's end and concedes the overthrow
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, 1 run dropped with soft hands for another single on the off side
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run driven from the crease to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run backs away towards the leg side and square drives the ball with power off his stumps to point, where Rohit dives to his left to save a boundary
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run moves back and across and defends the ball on the leg side, only four runs off that over
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run short of a length and straight, gets off his toes and swats the ball through square leg

Yadav to Smith, 1 run a length ball on off stump, Smith moves a touch to leg, exposing all three stumps and dabs the ball behind point, such shots are possible only when there is zero lateral movement
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run defended hard into the pitch, the ball bounces high over the stumps to Dhoni and they run a single even now, before Dhoni can't get to the ball
Yadav to Smith, 2 runs reaches for the ball outside off and drives the ball behind point
Yadav to Smith, no run a real effort ball, the bouncer climbs on Smith who lean back and tries to ramp it over the keeper, he misses
Yadav to Smith, 1 leg bye tries to heave a length ball across the line and misses and gets hit on the thigh, are Australia making their acceleration now?
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run back of a length, Smith aims to clip it away to the leg side but only manages an inside edge
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, no run back of a length, tucks Bailey up for room. Blocked to the leg side
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, 1 run back of a length on middle, turned through square leg. There is the 200-run stand. Another milestone ticked off
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, FOUR runs dug in short, Smith is quick to latch onto the pull, pulling behind square, beating Umesh in the deep
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 2 runs full and on off, Smith shuffles across and whips through backward square leg for only one. No back up for the throw, sloppy stuff for India. They get two
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run back of a length and on off, Smith hangs back and glides a single down to third man
Yadav to Smith, 1 run Smith brings up a century of his own. He raises his bat and is embraced by his partner. Pitched up on off, the skip skips across off and clips it fine on the leg side
Yadav to Bailey, FOUR runs short and width outside off, Bailey pounces on it, flaying it past point for four
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run short and just a shade outside off, chopped behind point for one now
Yadav to Smith, no run back of a length and on off, Smith gets forward and across as he pushes it to mid-on
Yadav to Smith, FOUR runs Smith makes room outside leg, the bowler goes full on middle, drilled down the ground. Ashwin dives to his left at mid-on. The effort ends in vain

Yadav to Smith, FOUR runs back of a length, Smith jumps outside leg again. He swings hard and gets a thick inside edge that runs away past the leg stump for the third four of the over. Looks like Australia have kicked into a higher gear
Barinder Sran to Bailey, 1 run back of a length and angling away, dabbed to third man
Barinder Sran to Smith, FOUR runs Smith beats mid-on to his left again! Banged in short and outside off, Smith loads up and swings it away for four! He reaches his career-best ODI score now
Barinder Sran to Smith, no run back of a length, Smith shuffles across and lobs the ball in front of midwicket
Barinder Sran to Smith, no run slower ball at 94ks, he generates some extra bounce as well. The batsman is surprised as he yanks his bottom hand off the bat and defends
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 run shortish and outside off, played to backward point
Barinder Sran to Bailey, 1 run Bailey runs down the pitch again, Sran bangs it short. It gets big on Bailey, but he manages to swat it behind square on the off side
Jadeja to Bailey, no run pushed through on middle, check-driven back to the bowler
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run straight ball, punched crisply to long-off
Jadeja to Smith, SIX runs Bang! Tossed up, Smith steps out and launches it straight down the ground with great authority
Jadeja to Smith, no run fired short, punched back to the bowler
Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs short and width outside off, Smith now employs a cut and sends it past backward point
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run Smith goes low and laps this off-stump ball towards fine leg
Ashwin to Smith, 1 wide carrom ball? Darted wide down the leg side as the batsman steps out. Dhoni can't gather cleanly
Ashwin to Smith, no run width outside off, cut to backward point
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run slides on, tapped in front of cover
Ashwin to Bailey, no run Bailey uses his feet and flicks to midwicket
Ashwin to Bailey, no run skids on leg from round the wicket, punched back as Ashwin dives to his right and stops the ball
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run hurled on middle, punched down the ground
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 run full and angling away outside off, solid drive to long-on
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 run short and on middle and leg, Maxi swivels and pulls down to long leg
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 wide bouncer outside off, slower loopy one. Smith drops his hands on it. Wide
Barinder Sran to Smith, no run back of a length and outside off, hit to cover
Barinder Sran to Smith, no run 94ks slower ball heading down the leg side, diverted to the left of Dhoni
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 run full and outside off at 117ks, tricks the batsman into playing early. Driven off the inside edge, lobs over the stumps
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 run length ball on off, Maxi moves forward and runs it towards backward point
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run flighted on off, defended back to the bowler
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run poked back to the bowler again
Ashwin to Maxwell, FOUR runs Maxi makes room outside the leg stump, Ashwin follows him. Slaps it away through the covers. Not the back away look away cut.. Maxi did follow the ball there
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run flat and outside off, punched to backward point
Ashwin to Marsh, no run flighted and outside off, front-foot drive to cover
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 wide slower-ball bouncer outside off, another ball that loops over to Dhoni. Add another wide to the total
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 run dug in outside off at 118ks, Smith hangs back, waits for it to arrive and pulls to deep midwicket
Barinder Sran to Marsh, 1 run short ball on middle at normal pace, pulled to deep midwicket
Barinder Sran to Smith, 1 run 95ks, floaty full toss on off, smoothly pushed to long-off
Barinder Sran to Marsh, 3 runs short and angled away outside off, Marsh rides the bounce and back-cuts it through backward point
Barinder Sran to Smith, FOUR runs full and width outside off, laced past backward point for another four. And Smith has a word with a debutant
Barinder Sran to Smith, 2 runs pitched up and outside off, eased to deep cover now
Ashwin to Marsh, 1 run shortish offbreak, punched to long-off
Ashwin to Smith, no run pushed through from round the stumps, Smith targets the leg side and nearly pops a return catch off a leading edge
Ashwin to Smith, 2 runs flicked away through backward square leg for a couple
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run slides on off, chopped towards cover
Ashwin to Marsh, 1 run down the pitch and bunted down to long-on
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run the batsman skips out, meets it on the full and drives it past the diving Ashwin
Yadav to Smith, 1 run full and on off, whipped down to long-on. Smith wants two but has to settle with one
Yadav to Marsh, no run back of a length and zipping through outside off, beats the cut
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run full and on middle, hoicked through midwicket off an inside edge
Yadav to Smith, 1 run Smith hangs back, then shuffles across and clips it behind square
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run banged in short, hurries onto Marsh. He sends it flying over midwicket off a top edge
Yadav to Smith, 1 run slow yorker, dips on off at 117ks, dug out to the leg side
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run full ball outside off, slower at 110ks, pushed to midwicket. Ashwin throws himself to his left and stops the ball
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run back of a length, extra bounce outside off. Cut and a miss. Smith is frustrated
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 3 runs dug in short and outside off, beautifully punched behind point. Sran runs across from sweeper cover, slides, and hauls the ball in
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 1 run short ball outside off, flayed past cover
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run Bhuvneshwar sucks pace off this again. 117ks short ball, the batsman waits and punches it down to long-on
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 1 run short ball on off, chopped down to short third man
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run short ball down leg, Marsh shapes to pull but does not connect properly. Toe-ends it behind square
Yadav to Smith, 1 leg bye back of a length and may have been just a shade outside off, Smith hops and is smacked on the thigh
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run short ball outside off, cut to third man
Yadav to Smith, no run shortish and outside off, punched to Jadeja at backward point
Yadav to Smith, 1 run full and on middle, Smith, who was deep in the crease, whips to deep midwicket
Yadav to Marsh, no run Umesh nails an inswinging yorker, Marsh jams his bat down hurriedly
Barinder Sran to Faulkner, 1 wide Faulkner nips down the track, Sran floats another back-of-the-hand slower ball down the leg side
Barinder Sran to Faulkner, 1 run Australia gun down 310, the highest successful chase at the WACA! Full and on off, punched down to long-on. Faulkner finishes it off
That is all we have for you. Many thanks for turning in and sending mails. Do come back for the second ODI on Friday. Until then, goodbye and cheerio.
Steven Smith is the Man of the Match.

India's bowlers had fared well in the early exchanges before fading away in the face of the Bailey-Smith double-century stand. Sran showed off his range with some floaty bouncers, back-of-the-hand slower balls, but Ashwin and Jadeja lacked penetration.
Australia won by 5 wickets (with 4 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Steven Smith, AUS
